column1: A bounding pulse and rapid heart rate both occur in the following conditions or events: - Abnormal or rapid heart rhythms - Anemia - Anxiety - Chronic kidney disease - Heart failure - Heart valve problem called aortic regurgitation - Heavy exercise - Fever - Pregnancy, because of increased fluid and blood in the body - Overactive thyroid (hyperthyroidisim)
- Does it only happen along with other symptoms, such as palpitations?
